department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: REQUEST FOR STANDING OFFERS FOR LIQUID NITROGEN
description: To meet the ongoing requirements for a facility in Saskatoon, Canada, we require the purchase and delivery of nitrogen gas in tanks. We are requesting standing offers for this requirement
duration_in_months: That is equivalent to 42 months once the contract starts
full_summary:
****
**Title:** Request for Standing Offers: Liquid Nitrogen Supply and Delivery for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

**Reference Number:** WS4302279238 - Doc4613668037

**Publication Date:** June 10, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** June 26, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

**Notice ID:** Tenders.Canada to Document No. WS4302279238

**Notice URL:** Discover Ariba Discovery: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19971157?extsite=MTk5NzExNTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19971157?extsite=MTk5NzExNTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Procurement Overview:**

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking bidders to supply and deliver tanks full of liquid nitrogen to the Saskatoon Research and Development Centre, under an "if and when required" basis. This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes the previous RFSO, Doc4332521982, dated December 4, 2023, with a closing date of January 19, 2024.

**Award Information:**

This procurement is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), among others.

**Purchase Quantity:**

There are no specified quantities in this procurement. However, the exact requirements will be determined by the end-users based on their operational needs.

**Regions of Opportunity:**

- Saskatoon

**Contact Information:**

Cao, Luke (SPAC/PSPC) (he/him)
Email: [lukE.Cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lukE.Cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
